items.text: 我每天早上六点起床
items.romanization: wǒ měi tiān zǎo shang liù diǎn qǐ chuáng

gloss.en: I get up at six o'clock every morning

items.text: 你觉得这本书怎么样
items.romanization: nǐ juéde zhè běn shū zěnme yàng

gloss.en: What do you think of this book

items.text: 我打算明年去中国旅游
items.romanization: wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián qù Zhōngguó lǚyóu

gloss.en: I plan to travel to China next year

items.text: 这个问题不太容易回答
items.romanization: zhège wèntí bù tài róngyì huídá

gloss.en: This question is not easy to answer

items.text: 你能帮我照顾一下我的狗吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ zhàogù yīxià wǒ de gǒu ma

gloss.en: Can you help take care of my dog

items.text: 虽然下雨了，我们还是去爬山吧
items.romanization: suīrán xiàyǔ le, wǒmen háishì qù páshān ba

gloss.en: Even though it's raining, let's still go hiking

items.text: 他从小就对音乐很感兴趣
items.romanization: tā cóng xiǎo jiù duì yīnyuè hěn gǎn xìngqù

gloss.en: He has been interested in music since childhood

items.text: 请把这些文件发到我的邮箱
items.romanization: qǐng bǎ zhèxiē wénjiàn fā dào wǒ de yóuxiāng

gloss.en: Please send these documents to my email

items.text: 我每天都坚持锻炼身体
items.romanization: wǒ měitiān dōu jiānchí duànliàn shēntǐ

gloss.en: I insist on exercising every day

items.text: 在中国，坐火车旅行很方便
items.romanization: zài Zhōngguó, zuò huǒchē lǚxíng hěn fāngbiàn

gloss.en: Traveling by train in China is very convenient

items.text: 我对中国文化非常感兴趣
items.romanization: wǒ duì Zhōngguó wénhuà fēicháng gǎn xìngqù

gloss.en: I am very interested in Chinese culture

items.text: 他在会议上提出了一个重要的建议
items.romanization: tā zài huìyì shàng tíchū le yī gè zhòngyào de jiànyì

gloss.en: He made an important suggestion at the meeting

items.text: 如果你有时间，我们可以一起吃晚饭
items.romanization: rúguǒ nǐ yǒu shíjiān, wǒmen kěyǐ yīqǐ chī wǎnfàn

gloss.en: If you have time, we can have dinner together

items.text: 老师要求我们每天写日记
items.romanization: lǎoshī yāoqiú wǒmen měitiān xiě rìjì

gloss.en: The teacher requires us to write a diary every day

items.text: 你能帮我看看这个合同吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ kànkàn zhège hétóng ma

gloss.en: Can you help me look at this contract

items.text: 他花了很多时间准备演讲
items.romanization: tā huā le hěn duō shíjiān zhǔnbèi yǎnjiǎng

gloss.en: He spent a lot of time preparing for the presentation

items.text: 我们应该尊重每个人的选择
items.romanization: wǒmen yīnggāi zūnzhòng měi gèrén de xuǎnzé

gloss.en: We should respect everyone's choices

items.text: 这个问题需要进一步讨论
items.romanization: zhège wèntí xūyào jìnyībù tǎolùn

gloss.en: This issue needs further discussion

items.text: 他总是能够找到解决问题的方法
items.romanization: tā zǒngshì nénggòu zhǎodào jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ

gloss.en: He always finds a way to solve problems

items.text: 我希望能尽快收到你的回复
items.romanization: wǒ xīwàng néng jǐnkuài shōudào nǐ de huífù

gloss.en: I hope to receive your reply as soon as possible

items.text: 请尽快与我联系
items.romanization: qǐng jǐnkuài yǔ wǒ liánxì

gloss.en: Please contact me as soon as possible

items.text: 他刚刚从国外旅行回来
items.romanization: tā gānggāng cóng guówài lǚxíng huílái

gloss.en: He just returned from traveling abroad

items.text: 你能帮我推荐一家好的餐厅吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ tuījiàn yī jiā hǎo de cāntīng ma

gloss.en: Can you recommend a good restaurant to me

items.text: 会议从两点开始，大约持续三个小时
items.romanization: huìyì cóng liǎng diǎn kāishǐ, dàyuē chíxù sān gè xiǎoshí

gloss.en: The meeting starts at two o'clock and lasts about three hours

items.text: 他的新书已经在书店里上架了
items.romanization: tā de xīn shū yǐjīng zài shūdiàn lǐ shàngjià le

gloss.en: His new book is already on the shelves in the bookstore

items.text: 我父母计划明年搬到北京
items.romanization: wǒ fùmǔ jìhuà míngnián bān dào Běijīng

gloss.en: My parents plan to move to Beijing next year

items.text: 请尽快回复这个邮件
items.romanization: qǐng jǐnkuài huífù zhège yóujiàn

gloss.en: Please reply to this email as soon as possible

items.text: 昨天的聚会非常有趣
items.romanization: zuótiān de jùhuì fēicháng yǒuqù

gloss.en: Yesterday's party was very interesting

items.text: 他最近忙于准备考试
items.romanization: tā zuìjìn máng yú zhǔnbèi kǎoshì

gloss.en: He has been busy preparing for the exam recently

items.text: 在机场等了两个小时，我终于登机了
items.romanization: zài jīchǎng děng le liǎng gè xiǎoshí, wǒ zhōngyú dēngjī le

gloss.en: After waiting for two hours at the airport, I finally boarded the plane

items.text: 如果天气好，我们就去爬山
items.romanization: rúguǒ tiānqì hǎo, wǒmen jiù qù páshān

gloss.en: If the weather is good, we will go hiking

items.text: 他总是有很多奇怪的想法
items.romanization: tā zǒngshì yǒu hěnduō qíguài de xiǎngfǎ

gloss.en: He always has many strange ideas

items.text: 这家酒店的服务非常周到
items.romanization: zhè jiā jiǔdiàn de fúwù fēicháng zhōudào

gloss.en: The service at this hotel is very attentive

items.text: 你觉得这部电影怎么样
items.romanization: nǐ juéde zhè bù diànyǐng zěnmeyàng

gloss.en: What do you think of this movie

items.text: 我每天都坚持锻炼身体
items.romanization: wǒ měitiān dōu jiānchí duànliàn shēntǐ

gloss.en: I exercise regularly every day

items.text: 这项工作需要很强的责任心
items.romanization: zhè xiàng gōngzuò xūyào hěn qiáng de zérènxīn

gloss.en: This job requires a strong sense of responsibility

items.text: 他在公司里是个非常有能力的人
items.romanization: tā zài gōngsī lǐ shì gè fēicháng yǒu nénglì de rén

gloss.en: He is a very capable person in the company

items.text: 我一到家就开始做晚饭
items.romanization: wǒ yī dào jiā jiù kāishǐ zuò wǎnfàn

gloss.en: I start cooking dinner as soon as I get home

items.text: 上周末我和朋友一起去爬山
items.romanization: shàng zhōumò wǒ hé péngyou yīqǐ qù páshān

gloss.en: Last weekend I went hiking with friends

items.text: 我觉得学习中文非常有趣
items.romanization: wǒ juéde xuéxí zhōngwén fēicháng yǒuqù

gloss.en: I think learning Chinese is very interesting

items.text: 他是我们班上最聪明的学生之一
items.romanization: tā shì wǒmen bān shàng zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng zhī yī

gloss.en: He is one of the smartest students in our class

items.text: 明天的会议几点开始
items.romanization: míngtiān de huìyì jǐ diǎn kāishǐ

gloss.en: What time does tomorrow's meeting start

items.text: 会议已经开始了
items.romanization: huì yì yǐ jīng kāi shǐ le

gloss.en: The meeting has already started

items.text: 请把这份文件发给我
items.romanization: qǐng bǎ zhè fèn wén jiàn fā gěi wǒ

gloss.en: Please send me this document

items.text: 我明天下午有一个重要的会议
items.romanization: wǒ míng tiān xià wǔ yǒu yī gè zhòng yào de huì yì

gloss.en: I have an important meeting tomorrow afternoon

items.text: 这家餐厅的菜非常好吃
items.romanization: zhè jiā cān tīng de cài fēi cháng hǎo chī

gloss.en: The food at this restaurant is very delicious

items.text: 他每天早上都跑步锻炼身体
items.romanization: tā měi tiān zǎo shàng dōu pǎo bù duàn liàn shēn tǐ

gloss.en: He jogs every morning to exercise

items.text: 我们需要尽快完成这个项目
items.romanization: wǒ men xū yào jǐn kuài wán chéng zhè gè xiàng mù

gloss.en: We need to complete this project as soon as possible

items.text: 请问，最近的地铁站在哪里
items.romanization: qǐng wèn, zuì jìn de dì tiě zhàn zài nǎ lǐ

gloss.en: Excuse me, where is the nearest subway station

items.text: 这本书对我的研究很有帮助
items.romanization: zhè běn shū duì wǒ de yán jiū hěn yǒu bāng zhù

gloss.en: This book is very helpful for my research

items.text: 我对这部电影的印象很深刻
items.romanization: wǒ duì zhè bù diàn yǐng de yìn xiàng hěn shēn kè

gloss.en: I have a deep impression of this movie

items.text: 请你帮我看看这件衣服合适吗
items.romanization: qǐng nǐ bāng wǒ kàn kàn zhè jiàn yī fú hé shì ma

gloss.en: Please help me see if this piece of clothing fits

items.text: 我打算暑假去北京旅游
items.romanization: wǒ dǎ suàn shǔ jià qù běi jīng lǚ yóu

gloss.en: I plan to travel to Beijing during the summer vacation

items.text: 这份报告需要再修改一次
items.romanization: zhè fèn bào gào xū yào zài xiū gǎi yī cì

gloss.en: This report needs to be revised again

items.text: 她最近在学习法语
items.romanization: tā zuì jìn zài xué xí fǎ yǔ

gloss.en: She is learning French recently

items.text: 我已经给你发了电子邮件
items.romanization: wǒ yǐ jīng gěi nǐ fā le diàn zǐ yóu jiàn

gloss.en: I have already sent you an email

items.text: 他对音乐有很大的兴趣
items.romanization: tā duì yīn yuè yǒu hěn dà de xìng qù

gloss.en: He has a great interest in music

items.text: 请问，这附近有药店吗
items.romanization: qǐng wèn, zhè fù jìn yǒu yào diàn ma

gloss.en: Excuse me, is there a pharmacy nearby

items.text: 这个问题非常复杂，需要进一步讨论
items.romanization: zhè gè wèn tí fēi cháng fù zá, xū yào jìn yī bù tǎo lùn

gloss.en: This issue is very complex and needs further discussion

items.text: 我喜欢在周末看书和听音乐
items.romanization: wǒ xǐ huān zài zhōu mò kàn shū hé tīng yīn yuè

gloss.en: I like to read books and listen to music on weekends

items.text: 你能帮我推荐一个好医生吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ tuī jiàn yī gè hǎo yī shēng ma

gloss.en: Can you recommend a good doctor to me

items.text: 我希望将来能有机会去国外工作
items.romanization: wǒ xī wàng jiāng lái néng yǒu jī huì qù guó wài gōng zuò

gloss.en: I hope to have the opportunity to work abroad in the future
